mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SEARCH_LIST_CACHE ( CORP_NAME, STOCK_TYPE, KEYWORDS_JSON, GPT_SUMMARY ) VALUES ( #{corpName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keywords, jdbcType=CLOB, typeHandler=com.project.web.handler.JsonTypeHandler}, #{gptSummary, jdbcType=CLOB} )
mapper.select: SELECT CORP_NAME AS corpName, STOCK_TYPE AS stockType, KEYWORDS_JSON AS keywords, GPT_SUMMARY AS gptSummary FROM SEARCH_LIST_CACHE WHERE CORP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{corpName} || '%'
